title: How to post my book on Goodreads - Quora

response.answer_text: This is the link where you can add a book to the catalogue: Add a New Book * Alternatively, you can ask a Librarian in the Goodreads Librarians Group to add it for you. In case it comes up, that’s also where you go if you make a typo, or find a duplicate entry for a book or a quote - a librarian can correct all of those things. *Just to be clear, you can add new entries to the Goodreads catalogue, but you can’t upload actual books.
